data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Saint Luke, Dominica by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Luke, Dominica
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Saint Luke with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 306 believers in the state of Saint Luke to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Saint Luke, Dominica to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Pointe Michel
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Pointe Michel, Saint Luke, Dominica.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Saint Luke, Dominica.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Saint Luke, Dominica to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,700 people living in Saint Luke, Dominica. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
